original_text:
Hitman
Hitman è un nome molto noto che farà tremare il cuore dei giocatori che hanno avuto modo di vedere e apprezzare l’omonimo personaggio dei videogame. Questa slot machine online, realizzata da Microgaming ha una struttura che parte da 5 rulli per 3 con 15 linee di pagamento. A sorprendere sono le caratteristiche bonus del gioco, oltre alla possibilità di vincere un jackpot da capogiro. Potrebbe però far storcere il naso ad alcuni giocatori per il tipo di design presentato, anche se risolleva gli animi grazie a 3 giochi bonus e ai suoi 18 giri gratuiti con i quali si possono moltiplicare le vincite. Di seguito ci concentreremo sui suoi punti di forza, così da conoscere da vicino il gameplay di una slot machine che non può assolutamente passare inosservata.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
Come accennato poco fa, non è sicuramente la grafica il suo punto di forza: sembra di trovarsi in un videogame anni 2000, non definito a dovere e con una scelta stilistica tutt’altro che moderna. Tra i simboli scelti non possono mancare il noto agente 47, le sue revolver, un coltello, le mitragliatrici e le icone speciali. Il Wild è lo stesso agente, che diventa il Jolly con il quale sostituire tutti i simboli del gameplay in modo da completare le combinazioni anche quando mancano dei simboli. Lo Scatter invece è assegnato a più immagini. Ma prima di iniziare la tua caccia al bersaglio dovrai impostare la scommessa: scegli tra 1 e 15 linee di pagamento, con un valore che si sposta da un minimo di 0,01 a 0,5€.
Sono disponibili più di 30 combinazioni vincenti e quando ne realizzi una si presentano delle animazioni diverse sullo schermo di gioco.
Degni di nota sono i 3 giochi bonus della slot. Partiamo da Contract, che si attiva quando posizioni 3 simboli bonus sui rulli 3, 4 e 5. Dovrai scegliere il bersaglio, che presenta un numero di monete minimo e massimo da vincere, e un’arma per colpirlo, alla quale si assegna un moltiplicatore casuale da 2x a 5x. Si passa poi a Insigna, che si sblocca con 3 simboli Scatter sui rulli 1, 2 e 3: basterà scegliere uno dei simboli in questione per vincere l’importo a esso abbinato. Per avere i giri gratuiti invece bisogna trovare 3 o più volte l’icona Free Spin sulla griglia. In questa fase le vincite sono raddoppiate e si possono trovare nuovi giochi bonus ma non si ricevono altri spin gratuiti. E infine, con il Wild espandibile puoi far diffondere il Jolly su tutte le caselle, per realizzare combinazioni vincenti su tutte le linee attive.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Hitman
La slot Hitman è un buon prodotto, soprattutto se consideriamo che parte da una struttura classica e ha un payout nella media del settore di gioco online. Sono molto valide le sue funzioni e decisamente variegate, capaci di non rendere mai noioso il gameplay. Ogni rotazione, infatti, riesce a regalare emozione e curiosità nel riuscire a sbloccare le ricche funzionalità che abbiamo elencato in questa recensione. Non dimentichiamo poi che ha anche un RTP interessante con un valore pari al 95,84%.

raw_translation.response:
Hitman
Hitman is a well-known name that will make the hearts of experienced gamblers who have seen and appreciated the eponymous video game character tremble. This online slot machine, developed by Microgaming, has a structure that starts with 5 reels and 3 rows with 15 paylines. What surprises players are the game's bonus features, in addition to the chance to win an astounding jackpot. However, the design presented may disappoint some players, although it reinvigorates the spirits thanks to its 3 bonus games and 18 free spins, with which players can multiply their winnings. Below, we will focus on its strengths to get a closer look at the gameplay of a slot machine that cannot go unnoticed.
Graphics and Game Symbols
As mentioned earlier, graphics is not its strong point, as it seems like being in a 2000s video game, not well-defined and with a stylistic choice that is far from modern. Among the chosen symbols, the famous agent 47, his revolvers, a knife, machine guns, and special icons cannot be missed. The Wild is the same agent, which becomes the Joker and can replace all game symbols to complete combinations even when symbols are missing. The Scatter is assigned to multiple images. Before starting your target hunt, however, you must set your bet: choose between 1 and 15 paylines, with a value ranging from a minimum of €0.01 to €0.5.
More than 30 winning combinations are available, and when one is realized, different animations appear on the game screen.
The slot's 3 bonus games are noteworthy. Let's start with Contract, which is activated when you place 3 bonus symbols on reels 3, 4, and 5. You must choose the target, which has a minimum and maximum number of coins to win, and a weapon to hit it, to which a random multiplier of 2x to 5x is assigned. We then move on to Insigna, which is unlocked with 3 Scatter symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3: just choose one of the symbols in question to win the amount associated with it. To get free spins, you must find the Free Spin icon on the grid 3 or more times. During this phase, winnings are doubled, and players can find new bonus games, but they will not receive any more free spins. Lastly, with the expanding Wild, you can spread the Joker over all the boxes to make winning combinations on all active lines.
Final Thoughts on the Hitman Slot
The Hitman slot is a good product, especially considering that it starts from a classic structure and has a payout average of the online gaming sector. Its functions are very valid and decidedly varied, capable of never making the gameplay boring, as each rotation manages to give excitement and curiosity to unlock the rich features we have listed in this review. Let's not forget that it also has an interesting RTP with a value equal to 95.84%.

Hitman is a well-known name that will make the hearts of experienced gamblers tremble. This online slot machine, created by Microgaming, has a classic structure with 5 reels and 15 paylines. What sets it apart are its impressive bonus features, as well as the chance to win a massive jackpot. Some players may not be impressed by its design, but it is quickly redeemed by its three bonus games and 18 free spins, which can multiply your winnings. In this review, we will focus on its strengths, so that you can fully appreciate the gameplay of a slot machine that cannot be overlooked.

Graphics and Game Symbols

The graphics may not be the strongest aspect of the game, presenting an outdated video game style rather than a modern design. However, iconic symbols such as Agent 47, his guns, knife, and special icons are included. The Wild symbol is Agent 47 himself, who becomes a substitute for all other symbols in the game, while the Scatter is assigned to several images. Before starting your hunt for the target, you need to set your bet, choosing between 1 and 15 paylines with values ranging from 0.01 to 0.5€.

There are over 30 winning combinations available, and when you get one, various animations appear on the game screen. There are also three bonus games worth mentioning. First, there is Contract, activated by landing three bonus symbols on reels 3, 4, and 5. You must select a target, with a minimum and maximum coin prize to be won, and a weapon to hit it with, which is assigned a random multiplier ranging from 2x to 5x. Then there is Insigna, unlocked by getting three Scatter symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3. Simply choose one of the symbols to win the associated amount.

To activate the free spins, you need to find three or more Free Spin icons on the grid. During this phase, the winnings are doubled, and new bonus games can be found, but no more free spins are given. Finally, with the expandable Wild, you can spread the Jolly to all positions, creating winning combinations on every active line.

Final Thoughts on Hitman slot

The Hitman slot is a good product, especially considering its classic structure and average payout within the online gaming industry. Its varied features are impressive, keeping the gameplay interesting and exciting. Every spin offers a chance to unlock the game's rich functionalities that we've listed in this review. Moreover, the game has an interesting RTP value, with a return rate of 95.84%.

Review: Hitman
Hitman is a well-known name that will make the hearts of experienced gamblers who have seen and appreciated the eponymous video game character tremble. This online slot machine, developed by Microgaming, has a structure that starts with 5 reels and 3 rows with 15 paylines. What surprises players are the game's bonus features, in addition to the chance to win an astounding jackpot. However, the design presented may disappoint some players, although it reinvigorates the spirits thanks to its 3 bonus games and 18 free spins, with which players can multiply their winnings. Below, we will focus on its strengths to get a closer look at the gameplay of a slot machine that cannot go unnoticed.
Graphics and Game Symbols
As mentioned earlier, graphics is not its strong point, as it seems like being in a 2000s video game, not well-defined and with a stylistic choice that is far from modern. Among the chosen symbols, the famous agent 47, his revolvers, a knife, machine guns, and special icons cannot be missed. The Wild is the same agent, which becomes the Joker and can replace all game symbols to complete combinations even when symbols are missing. The Scatter is assigned to multiple images. Before starting your target hunt, however, you must set your bet: choose between 1 and 15 paylines, with a value ranging from a minimum of €0.01 to €0.5.
More than 30 winning combinations are available, and when one is realized, different animations appear on the game screen.
The slot's 3 bonus games are noteworthy. Let's start with Contract, which is activated when you place 3 bonus symbols on reels 3, 4, and 5. You must choose the target, which has a minimum and maximum number of coins to win, and a weapon to hit it, to which a random multiplier of 2x to 5x is assigned. We then move on to Insigna, which is unlocked with 3 Scatter symbols on reels 1, 2, and 3: just choose one of the symbols in question to win the amount associated with it. To get free spins, you must find the Free Spin icon on the grid 3 or more times. During this phase, winnings are doubled, and players can find new bonus games, but they will not receive any more free spins. Lastly, with the expanding Wild, you can spread the Joker over all the boxes to make winning combinations on all active lines.
Final Thoughts on the Hitman Slot
The Hitman slot is a good product, especially considering that it starts from a classic structure and has a payout average of the online gaming sector. Its functions are very valid and decidedly varied, capable of never making the gameplay boring, as each rotation manages to give excitement and curiosity to unlock the rich features we have listed in this review. Let's not forget that it also has an interesting RTP with a value equal to 95.84%.
